title: Migrate from CRA to Vite
body:
Why: Faster dev/builds, smaller bundles, CRA is aging.

Tasks:
- [ ] Replace react-scripts with Vite (react-ts template)
- [ ] Update tsconfig and paths
- [ ] Update scripts (dev/build/preview)
- [ ] Remove CRA-specific polyfills and service worker config

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] App starts with `vite` in dev and builds successfully
- [ ] HMR works
- [ ] Bundle size reduced vs current build

title: Upgrade to React 18 and Chakra UI v2+
body:
Why: Modern APIs and maintained ecosystem.

Tasks:
- [ ] React 18 `createRoot` migration
- [ ] Chakra UI v2+ upgrade guide applied
- [ ] Framer Motion compatibility verified

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] App runs without warnings; all components render
- [ ] No breaking style regressions

title: Replace react-helmet with react-helmet-async
body:
Why: Safe with concurrent rendering.

Tasks:
- [ ] Install and wrap app with HelmetProvider
- [ ] Replace Helmet imports

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Head tags render correctly

title: Remove IE polyfills and modernize browserslist
body:
Why: Reduce bundle, IE11 is EOL.

Tasks:
- [ ] Remove react-app-polyfill and core-js imports
- [ ] Update package.json browserslist to modern targets

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] App loads without polyfills; Lighthouse score improved

title: Enable TypeScript strict mode and upgrade to TS 5.x
body:
Why: Catch more bugs with types.

Tasks:
- [ ] Upgrade TypeScript to 5.x
- [ ] Enable `strict` in tsconfig
- [ ] Fix resulting type errors

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] `tsc --noEmit` passes

title: Remove @ts-nocheck and add proper types to components
body:
Why: Improve type safety.

Files: `src/components/projects.tsx`, `src/components/intro.tsx`.

Tasks:
- [ ] Define Project and Skills interfaces
- [ ] Type props and state

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] No @ts-nocheck markers; typecheck passes

title: Fix invalid React keys in Skills grid
body:
Why: Prevent reconciliation bugs.

Tasks:
- [ ] Use a stable, unique key (e.g., section or name)

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] No React key warnings in console

title: Normalize technology naming in project data
body:
Why: Filters rely on exact string match.

Tasks:
- [ ] Standardize names (e.g., Power BI vs PowerBi, Node.js vs NodeJS)
- [ ] Add unit test asserting filter coverage

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Filters surface all relevant items consistently

title: Introduce dark mode and color mode toggle
body:
Why: Accessibility and UX.

Tasks:
- [ ] Configure Chakra color mode manager
- [ ] Add toggle in Header
- [ ] Ensure contrast meets AA in both modes

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Toggle persists; audited with axe

title: Unify typography and fonts
body:
Why: Theme references custom fonts; packages include Open Sans/Raleway.

Tasks:
- [ ] Choose a single font family via @fontsource (e.g., Inter)
- [ ] Update theme to use that family for heading/body
- [ ] Remove unused font packages and custom font loader if obsolete

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Visual parity; CLS not worsened; font-display swap configured

title: Refine card grid spacing and section paddings
body:
Why: Improve visual rhythm.

Tasks:
- [ ] Review container paddings and gaps
- [ ] Align to a consistent spacing scale

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Grid feels balanced on mobile/desktop

title: Responsive images and modern formats
body:
Why: Performance and clarity.

Tasks:
- [ ] Add srcset/sizes for project images
- [ ] Generate WebP/AVIF with fallbacks

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Improved Lighthouse performance; crisp images on retina

title: Remove unused legacy CSS
body:
Why: Reduce CSS bloat.

Tasks:
- [ ] Delete unused .btn styles from index.css if not referenced

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] No visual regression; CSS size reduced

title: Code-split heavy sections
body:
Why: Faster first load.

Tasks:
- [ ] Lazy-load Projects and Skills
- [ ] Add skeletons/placeholders

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Lower initial JS; no layout shift

title: Filter UX: counts and persistence polish
body:
Why: Transparency and shareability.

Tasks:
- [ ] Show counts on filter chips
- [ ] Ensure URL sync resilient and has unit tests

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Back/forward works; deep links stable

title: Clean up copy and fix typos in project descriptions
body:
Why: Professional polish.

Tasks:
- [ ] Proofread and correct spelling/grammar

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] No typos; consistent tense/style

title: Improve SEO metadata and social cards
body:
Why: Better previews and discoverability.

Tasks:
- [ ] Add OG/Twitter meta tags
- [ ] Per-page/section titles where relevant

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Link previews show title/description/image

title: Stop committing build/ to main and use GH Pages Action
body:
Why: Keep repo clean; reproducible deploys.

Tasks:
- [ ] Remove build/ from repo, add to .gitignore
- [ ] Add pages deploy workflow (build, upload, deploy)
- [ ] Remove gh-pages npm script if unused

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Site deploys on push to main via Actions
